description:
The capital city of Inaho burns as Indra and the Dragon God battle one another while searching for Gokudo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Extraordinario, ¿Cual será el destino de Inaho?
Kyoutendouchi! Inaho-koku no Asu wa Docchi Da!? no Koto
World-Shattering World! Which Way Is the Future of Inaho!?
驚天動地! イナホ国の明日はどっちだ!? のこと
